section.title: Getting Bundlor with Ivy
section.para: Eclipse Virgo Bundlor can be obtained from an Ivy repository

listitem.para: Add the Virgo resolver to the ivysettings.xml file
Download the Eclipse Virgo Bundlor dependency in the build.xml file
listitem.programlisting: <ivy:cachepath resolveId="bundlor.classpath" pathid="bundlor.classpath" organisation="org.eclipse.virgo.bundlor" module="org.eclipse.virgo.bundlor.ant" revision="@bundle.version@" conf="ant" inline="true" type="jar" log="download-only"/>
